DOC.detailed_description: Thirty treatment seek smoker recruit complete 40-day within-subject ( cross-over ) , double-blind study ass effect varenicline brain activation perform certain task . Prior begin study , participant complete health physical screening determine final eligibility . Following medication run-up 3.5 day abstinence period , participant complete study period 1 ( fMRI scan perform attention , work memory emotion task ) . After 14 21-day washout period study procedure repeat placebo ( order study medication counterbalance ) . After completion study period , participant offer 13-week quit smoke program varenicline .
